mapper.select: select t.*,(select c.name from t_catalog c where c.id=t.catalogID) catalogName from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID} ) a
mapper.insert: insert into t_attribute ( id,catalogID ,name ,pid ) values ( id,#{catalogID} ,#{name} ,#{pid} )
mapper.select: select * from t_attribute t where 1=1 and pid!=-1
mapper.update: update t_attribute set id=#{id} ,name=#{name} ,catalogID=#{catalogID} ,pid=#{pid} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_attribute t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and pid=#{pid} and catalogID=#{catalogID}
mapper.delete: delete from t_attribute where 1=1 and id=#{id}
delete from t_attribute where 1=1 and pid=#{id}
